subject: Update documentation with CRM entity resolution (task 9)
description:
Updated documentation per tasks 9.1-9.3:

9.1 - CLAUDE.md updates:
- Added crm_entity_resolution to categories table (CLAUDE.md:66)
- Added candidate_sets, resolution_subsections, resolution_config, input_timestamp to Optional Fields (CLAUDE.md:88-91)
- Added candidate_sets Options section with schema, size limits, subsection activation (CLAUDE.md:155-195)
- Added resolution_config Options section with profiles and threshold semantics (CLAUDE.md:197-215)
- Added node ID crm-entity-resolution-cfg to Node IDs table (CLAUDE.md:746)
- Updated node count to 28, category count to 12, test count to 122
- Added CRM test coverage to test profile listing (CLAUDE.md:658)
- Added new error codes to Error Codes table (CLAUDE.md:530-532)

9.2 - docs/RESPONSE-FORMAT.md updates:
- Added crm_entity_resolution to categories table
- Added full CRM Entity Resolution section: subsections, field wrapper, ticket_match boolean independence, match_method enum, match_signals, match profiles, example response, error codes
- Added CRM access patterns to JavaScript examples
- Updated version to 7.0, added new error codes to master table

9.3 - Invocation examples added to CLAUDE.md:
- Example 13: CRM Company Matching (standalone, phonetic_tolerant)
- Example 14: CRM Ticket Verification (single ticket, boolean semantics)
- Example 15: Combined Extraction + CRM Resolution (caller + routing + resolution)
- Example 16: Multi-Step Orchestration Pattern (parent workflow chaining)
